content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of iron ore, and my updated inventory now shows:
# - 1 transport belt
# - 5 coal
# - 10 iron ore
# - 8 iron gear wheels
# 
# With the iron ore collected, I can now return to the stone furnace to smelt these ores into iron plates.

# I'll proceed to place the furnace and smelt the iron ore into plates.
# First, I need to ensure the furnace has enough fuel to operate.

# Inserting coal into the furnace for fuel.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Adding 5 coal to the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting the 10 iron ore into the furnace.

# Now, I will wait for the smelting process to complete.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds.
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 10:  # Check if 10 iron plates are produced.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After smelting, I will check my inventory again.
print(f"My Inventory after smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying inventory after smelting.
